## Source: ossf-package-analysis (eb997a2c5ef591ea20c8c075c319cf8a935d8fcd4682d0889be288986a25cdbf)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@sonahri51/orientation-change-end' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
